item.title: Delete/Change wildy locations
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok, here is part of my code…

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

Ok, so i know i gotta change the coords in “if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))”
And in “if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))”.

But What do i change these co-ords in, to delete the wildy? so no-where is wilderness?

All help appreciated.
Thanks

Read full topic
